siteTitle: Strollare | Find and compare baby strollers

home.title: Strollare
home.description: Whether you are headed for the mall, or a stroll in the park, a stroller is essential for life on the go with your baby. Stroller helps you compare and find the best baby stroller to fit your needs.

seo.metaDescription: Whether you are headed for the mall, or a stroll in the park, a stroller is essential for life on the go with your baby. Stroller helps you compare and find the best baby stroller to fit your needs.
seo.ogDescription: Whether you are headed for the mall, or a stroll in the park, a stroller is essential for life on the go with your baby. Stroller helps you compare and find the best baby stroller to fit your needs.

about.description: Strollare aims to aid you in your decision to purchase the right stroller for you baby. By having information on the various side by side, this should help you make a better comparison.
